console.title: AI Action Log
chart.tooltip.label: {label} Hz
error.pyodide.init: Failed to initialize Python environment. Please refresh the page.
error.audio.analysis: Failed to analyze the audio file. The file may be corrupt or in an unsupported format.
error.suggestion.fetch: Failed to get mastering suggestion. Please try again.
error.download.fail: Failed to process or download the mastered file.
error.pyodide.analysis_failed: Python-based audio analysis failed. Check the browser console for details.
error.gemini.safety: The response from the AI was flagged as unsafe. Please modify the prompt and try again.
error.gemini.no_key: Gemini API key is not set.
error.gemini.fail: Could not get mastering suggestion from AI.
error.gemini.invalid_params: The AI did not propose valid mastering parameters.
log.pyodide.install_packages: Installing Python packages: numpy, scipy, pyloudnorm
log.gemini.request: Requesting mastering parameters from AI agent...
log.gemini.success: Received mastering parameters from AI agent.
log.mastering.start: Starting mastering process and file export...
log.mastering.success: Mastered file generation complete. Saved to My Page.
log.action.init: High-purity signal chain analysis started. Loading all samples.
log.action.scan: Full-Range Spectral Analysis: Scanning track structure...
log.action.drop_detected: High-Energy Section location identified: Starts at {time} (Avg {rms} dB)
log.action.lufs_report: Integrated Loudness: {lufs} LUFS → {gap} dB to target {target}
log.action.signal_done: Signal analysis complete. Neural Mastering Protocol initialized.
log.action.self_correction: Self-correction: target {target} LUFS (10s simulation → gain auto-adjust)
log.action.gain_no_correction: No correction needed — AI proposal within ±0.5 dB
log.action.neuro_drive: Neuro-Drive Module: Parallel Hyper-Compression active (Threshold: -30dB, Ratio: 12:1, Attack: 5ms)
log.action.energy_filter: Energy Filter: 250Hz HPF — avoiding kick/bass phase interference
log.action.air_exciter: Air Exciter: 12kHz+ High-Shelf +4.0dB — hyper-high frequency stimulation
log.action.neuro_mix: Neuro Injection: Density +35% (Parallel Mix) — Hyper-Saturation Active
flow.post_login_banner: Signed in. You can now save your mastering results.
ux.leave_while_processing: Leaving while processing will lose data. Are you sure?
error.download.not_ready: The download is not ready yet. Please run mastering again.
error.download.no_entitlement: You do not have enough download credits (remaining: {count}).
error.download.verify_fail: Failed to verify your download entitlement. Please try again shortly.
error.save.fail: Failed to save. Please try again.
mypage.history.error: Failed to load history. Please try "Retry" again in a moment.
mypage.history.error_contact: If this keeps happening, please contact ishijima@b-p.co.jp.
mypage.history.empty_description: After mastering, save from "Purchase & Save" on the result screen; it will appear here (Stored for 7 days).

I am sending the AI-mastered track: {name}.
